actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the Federal minimum wage, to establish a Commission to conduct a study on the indexation of the Federal minimum wage, and for other purposes.
short_title: American Family Fair Minimum Wage Act of 1995

summary.text: American Family Fair Minimum Wage Act of 1995 - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the Federal minimum wage from $4.25 per hour to: (1) $4.75 beginning on September 1, 1995; (2) $5.25 beginning on September 1, 1996; and (3) $5.75 during the year beginning on September 1, 1997. Establishes the Commission on the Minimum Wage to study and report to the appropriate congressional committees on the indexation of the Federal minimum wage.

titles.title: American Family Fair Minimum Wage Act of 1995

A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the Federal minimum wage, to establish a Commission to conduct a study on the indexation of the Federal minimum wage, and for other purposes.
